keyMoments.title: Shu's Debut at Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: Marine Captain Shu makes his first appearance during the Buster Call operation, revealing his Sabi Sabi no Mi Devil Fruit power that allows him to rust metal.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a Marine officer whose ability directly counters swordsmen.
keyMoments.quote: I ate the Sabi Sabi no Mi. I'm a rust-man who can rust all your swords!

keyMoments.title: Shu Destroys Yubashiri
keyMoments.description: Shu uses his rust powers to completely destroy Zoro's sword Yubashiri, turning it to dust and leaving only the hilt.
keyMoments.significance: Successfully destroys one of Zoro's prized swords, demonstrating the danger of his Devil Fruit ability.

abilities.description: Shu can rust any metal object by touching it, causing weapons and metal items to corrode and crumble instantly.

reveals.information: Possesses the Sabi Sabi no Mi Devil Fruit
Marine Captain participating in Buster Call

keyMoments.title: Very Good's Debut
keyMoments.description: Marine Captain Very Good appears during the Buster Call, demonstrating his Beri Beri no Mi ability.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another Devil Fruit user among the Marine captains.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Franky
keyMoments.description: Very Good is defeated by Franky's Strong Hammer attack despite using his Berry-Berry powers for defense.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Franky can overcome Devil Fruit users' defensive abilities.

abilities.description: Very Good can separate his body into multiple berry-shaped orbs, making him immune to blunt attacks and allowing him to reform his body.

reveals.information: Possesses the Beri Beri no Mi Devil Fruit

keyMoments.title: Luffy Stands Despite Devastating Attack
keyMoments.description: After being hit by Lucci's Rokuogan, Luffy appears defeated but forces himself to stand up, demonstrating his incredible willpower and determination to save Robin.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic displays of Luffy's unbreakable will, defining his character.
keyMoments.quote: I can't fall here... Robin is waiting!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling
keyMoments.description: Luffy unleashes Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling for the first time, a devastating barrage combining Gear Second with his Gatling technique.
keyMoments.significance: Debuts one of Luffy's most iconic finishing moves that he will use throughout the series.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Defeats Rob Lucci
keyMoments.description: Luffy finally defeats Rob Lucci, CP9's strongest member, after an intense multi-episode battle.
keyMoments.significance: Major milestone showing Luffy can defeat World Government elite agents.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Reaffirms Promise to Robin
keyMoments.description: After defeating Lucci, Luffy calls out to Robin that they will go back together.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional payoff of the entire Enies Lobby arc, solidifying the crew's bond.

abilities.description: A high-speed barrage of punches in Gear Second, combining speed and power to overwhelm opponents with hundreds of rapid strikes.

reveals.information: Can use Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling

keyMoments.title: Usopp Reveals Himself to Luffy
keyMoments.description: Sogeking removes his mask and reveals himself as Usopp, calling out to motivate Luffy to stand up and continue fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Usopp's character growth and his willingness to drop his pride to support his captain and friend.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy! Stand up! You're not the kind of man who'd lose to someone like this!

relationships.description: Despite their conflict at Water 7, Usopp's faith in Luffy never wavered, as shown when he reveals himself to motivate his captain.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp reveals himself and encourages Luffy to stand, showing their deep friendship transcends their earlier conflict.

reveals.information: Reveals that Sogeking is actually Usopp

keyMoments.title: Yubashiri is Destroyed
keyMoments.description: Zoro's sword Yubashiri, one of the 50 Skillful Grade swords, is completely destroyed by Shu's rust powers during battle.
keyMoments.significance: Significant loss for Zoro, losing one of his prized swords that he received in Loguetown.
keyMoments.quote: One of my swords... rusted away!

keyMoments.title: Uses Sai Dai Rin: Rokuogan
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci unleashes his ultimate technique - an enhanced version of Rokuogan with greater power and range.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the peak of Lucci's Rokushiki mastery and his most powerful attack.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci is defeated by Luffy's Jet Gatling and crashes unconscious through the tower wall, ending their epic battle.
keyMoments.significance: First major defeat for CP9's strongest member, humiliating the World Government.

abilities.description: An enhanced version of Rokuogan where Lucci restrains his opponent with his tail and uses his enlarged leopard fists to deliver a more powerful shock wave with greater range.

reveals.information: Can use Sai Dai Rin: Rokuogan

keyMoments.title: Franky Defeats Very Good
keyMoments.description: Franky defeats Marine Captain Very Good using his Strong Hammer attack, showcasing his combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky fighting alongside the Straw Hats and his ability to defeat Devil Fruit users.

abilities.description: Franky uses his powerful mechanical arms to deliver a devastating hammer-like strike.

keyMoments.title: Robin's Emotional Response
keyMoments.description: Robin tearfully smiles when Luffy calls out to her after defeating Lucci, showing her emotional connection to the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Emotional payoff showing Robin has fully accepted the Straw Hats as her family.

relationships.description: Robin's emotional response to Luffy's declaration shows her deep bond with her captain and acceptance of the crew as family.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin tearfully smiles as Luffy reaffirms they will go back together, showing she has fully embraced the crew.
